a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisB4DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.4 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 4-dose schedule (birth dose + 3 primary series doses), on-time start * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisB4DosesLogic

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}"

operand.name: No hepatitis B primary series doses were administered
Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

operand.name: One hepatitis B primary series doses were administered
The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client's age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

a:s.a:s: "Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
